music_composer.journey:
Introduction about my music journey.

Started on guitar and expanded to bass, piano, ukulele, banjo, mandolin, and more.

Recorded using FL Studio 4 in 2004 and played bass in my church youth group.

First band received over 1 million plays during the MySpace era.

Since 2009, mainly releasing music under the name 'A Rocketâ€™s Intensity'.
